name: Randy Pospisil
bio: I'm a native of Cedar Rapids, Iowa, but I've lived in Dallas, Texas; Medford, Wisconsin; Topeka, Kansas; and Manchester, Iowa. I'm an Integration Analyst at Leepfrog Technologies in Coralville, IA. I have a Bachelor's Degree from the University of Iowa and a Masters of Theology (Th.M.) from Dallas Theological Seminary. I have two kids (Max and Atticus) and am married to Kim.
